thread.title: Jordan Ayew's Aston Villa coach admits he doesn't know his starting XI
thread.title_full: Jordan Ayew's Aston Villa coach admits he doesn't know his starting XI

title: Jordan Ayew's Aston Villa coach admits he doesn't know his starting XI
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 18:55 CET Jordan Ayew's Aston Villa coach admits he doesn't know his starting XI 
Here is a selection of their responses, including our man at Villa Gregg Evans’s preferred line-up – followed by the XIs Sherwood has picked for the first eight Premier League matches of the season. 
Gregg Evans (4-3-3): Guzan, Richards, Clark, Okore, Amavi; Gana, Westwood, Veretout; Gil, Grealish, Agbonlahor. 
Howard Hodgson (4-3-3) Guzan, Bacuna, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Gana, Veretout, Gil; Adama, Ayew, Grealish. 
Kenny Swaine (4-2-3-1): Guzan, Hutton, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Veretout, Gana; Adama, Gil, Grealish; Ayew. 
John Reynolds (3-4-3): Guzan, Okore, Richards, Clark; Bacuna, Gil, Gana, Amavi; Adama, Kozak, Grealish. 
Fussy Beggar (4-3-3): Bunn, Richards, Okore, Clark, Amavi; Grealish, Gil, Gana; Sinclair, Gestede, Adama. 
Dave B6 (4-2-3-1): Guzan, Richards, Okore, Clark, Amavi; Sanchez, Gana; Adama, Grealish, Gil; Ayew. 
Here are the eight line-ups – with substitutions – that Sherwood has fielded during the matches so far. 
Have a look through them before deciding which XI YOU think Villa should go with after the international break. 
Villa: (4-3-3): Guzan, Bacuna, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Westwood, Gana, Veretout (Sanchez, 71); Agbonlahor, Sinclair (Richardson, 77) Ayew(Gestede, 58). 
Subs not used: Bunn, Baker, Hutton, Cole.Villa (4-3-3): Guzan, Bacuna, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Westwood, Gana, Veretout, (Sanchez, 78); Agbonlahor, Sinclair (Gestede, 58), Ayew. 
Subs not used: Bunn, Baker, Richardson, Hutton, Kozak. 
Villa (4-4-1-1): Guzan, Bacuna, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Westwood, Gana, Sanchez, (Adama, 69) Grealish; Agbonlahor; Gestede. 
Subs not used: Bunn, Baker, Sinclair, Veretout, Ayew, Hutton. 
Villa: (4-3-3) Guzan, Hutton, Richards, Clark, Amavi; Bacuna (Gil, 68), Gana, Westwood; Sanchez, Sinclair, Gestede. 
Subs not used: Bunn, Bennett, Cole, Veretout, Kozak, Ayew. 
Villa (4-1-4-1): Guzan, Bacuna (Hutton, 85), Richards, Lescott, Amavi; Sanchez; Gil (Ayew 65), Westwood, Grealish, Sinclair; Agbonlahor (Gestede, 74) 
Subs: Bunn, Clark, Richardson, VeretoutVilla: (4-3-3): Guzan, Hutton, Richards, Lescott, Amavi; Sanchez (Veretout, 81), Westwood, Gil (Bacuna, 76); Grealish, Sinclair (Gestede, 46) Agbonlahor. 
Subs not used: Bunn, Clark, Bacuna, Cole, Ayew.Villa: (4-3-3) Guzan, Hutton, Richards, Lescott, Amavi; Sanchez (Veretout, 59), Westwood, Gana; Grealish (Adama, 68), Sinclair, Gestede. 
Subs not used: Bunn, Clark, Bacuna, Ayew, Gil.Villa (3-5-2): Guzan, Richards, Lescott (Grealish 46), Crespo, Hutton, Westwood (Gil 75), Veretout, Gana, Amavi, Sinclair (Ayew 59), Gestede. Subs not used: Bunn, Bacuna, Richardson, Sanchez.
